title: Branded
description: -Ryan-I've never experienced a real family firsthand. I had no idea what he was giving up to be with me. I'm keeping him from having everything. He'd be better off without me.-Russell-He thinks I'll be better off without him. That he isn't able to give me what I need physically or emotionally. I will make him see that heâ€™s all I'll ever want or need ...Even if I have to brand it into him to do it.
author: Cole Denton
